text.section: Subject to the limitations in this section, a local jurisdiction shall waive its examination requirements for an individual who is licensed by the State Board to provide electrical services as a master electrician.

A local jurisdiction shall grant a waiver under this section only if the applicant:
pays any license fee that the local jurisdiction requires; and
provides adequate evidence that the applicant:
is licensed as a master electrician under this title after passing an examination given by the State Board or complies with § 6-307 of this title;
holds an active State license; and
in place of any bond requirement of a local jurisdiction, meets the insurance requirements of § 6-604 of this subtitle.
Within 10 working days after payment of any local license fee, a local jurisdiction shall issue a local license to each applicant who meets the requirements of this section.
